Conditioner and a mini GrandeDRAMA Intense Thickening Mascara.

templates.content: Aside from having a slight difference in ingredients, the hair, lash and brow serums are all geared towards different results and are tailored as such. Our hair serum is formulated for use on dyed hair and helps to support hair health for the appearance of healthier, thicker looking hair. Our lash serum is suitable for contacts and lash extensions and helps to promote the appearance of naturally longer, thicker looking lashes. Our brow serum conditions brow hairs for a healthier looking appearance and helps to promote the appearance of naturally fuller, bolder looking brows.
templates.name: Hair VS Lash VS Brow Serum

templates.content: To redeem points, sign in and go to your account page. Once there, click on GrandeREWARDS. You can redeem points by clicking on the redeem tab. You can use up to $20 in rewards per order. Note that before adding the rewards code, the products in your cart must be equal or greater than your redemption amount. If your order total is less, you will forfeit the remaining rewards redemption difference.

templates.content: Lash shedding is a natural part of the 3-month lash life cycle and you may be surprised to learn that we typically lose at least 2-3 lashes a day! If you feel you are losing more than normal, this can be the result of improper product use. There are also many others reasons why this could be happening. It could be an ingredient in your make up remover, cleanser, or even environmental changes.
templates.name: I seem to be loosing more lashes than usual after using your product. Is that normal?
